sent.orig: The agency is the place where the agent works.
sent.trans: Agency就是代理人工作的地方。

sent.orig: Article 64 Agency shall include entrusted agency, statutory agency and appointed agency.
sent.trans: 第六十四条代理包括委托代理、法定代理和指定代理。

sent.orig: Article64. Agency shall include entrusted agency, statutory agency and appointed agency.
sent.trans: 第六十四条[代理种类]代理包括委托代理、法定代理和指定代理。

sent.orig: For the latter, continental law system as agency by estoppels as the agency of authorized agency.
sent.trans: 对于后者，则称为表见代理，表见代理即被称视为有代理权之代理，将发生与有权代理一样的法律后果。

sent.orig: The theory of agency deems that the relationship between owner and operator is consignation-agency.
sent.trans: 委托代理理论认为企业所有者和经营者之间是一种委托代理关系。
